rows.label: bf11050100_0010
rows.name: What was that you said, Baltrich?

rows.label: bf11050100_0020
rows.name: The Shiya capital of Homeropa has fallen...

rows.label: bf11050100_0030
rows.name:
Ah, rather, it was annihilated
Pope Rhadallis.

rows.label: bf11050100_0040
rows.name: So it has come to pass after all...

rows.label: bf11050100_0050
rows.name:
...Respectfully,
you aren't much of an actor, Holiness.

rows.label: bf11050100_0060
rows.name: It appears you are not surprised at all?

rows.label: bf11050100_0070
rows.name:
We heard disturbing rumors
circling among the Magisters.

rows.label: bf11050100_0080
rows.name:
Marveni...whom you recently 
elevated to Deacon...

rows.label: bf11050100_0090
rows.name:
People wonder if this calamity has
anything to do with that man's Blade...

rows.label: bf11050100_0100
rows.name:
With such extraordinary power,
is it really wise to, er...

rows.label: bf11050100_0110
rows.name: No matter whose power effected it,

rows.label: bf11050100_0115
rows.name: it is sure to serve the glory of Acedia.

rows.label: bf11050100_0130
rows.name: Holiness... Do you believe it can be controlled?

rows.label: bf11050100_0140
rows.name: If it cannot... I will let him take the blame.

rows.label: bf11050100_0150
rows.name:
Thank you for your report, Magister 
Baltrich. You may return to your duties.
